ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot.gnuplot

Class GnuPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot.Plot
      • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot.gnuplot.GnuPlot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusteredHistogram, GnuBoxPlot, Scatterplot

    public abstract class GnuPlot
extends Plot
    Top-level class for plots drawn using the GnuPlot software.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©

    • Method Detail

      • toGnuplot

        public final String toGnuplot(Plot.ImageType term,
                              boolean with_caption)
        Generates a stand-alone Gnuplot file for this plot
        Parameters:
        term - The terminal used to display the plot
        with_caption - Set to true to ignore the plot's caption when rendering
        Returns:
        The Gnuplot file contents

      • toGnuplot

        public abstract String toGnuplot(Plot.ImageType term,
                                 String lab_title,
                                 boolean with_caption)
        Generates a stand-alone Gnuplot file for this plot
        Parameters:
        term - The terminal used to display the plot
        lab_title - The title of the lab. This is only used in the auto-generated comments in the file's header
        with_caption - Set to true to ignore the plot's caption when rendering
        Returns:
        The Gnuplot file contents

      • getImage

        public final byte[] getImage(Plot.ImageType term,
                             boolean with_caption)
        Description copied from class: Plot
        Gets an image from this plot
        Specified by:
        getImage in class Plot
        Parameters:
        term - The image type to produce
        with_caption - Set to false to remove the caption from the image (even if a caption is defined for the plot)
        Returns:
        An array of bytes containing the image, or null if the image cannot be produced

      • isGnuplotPresent

        public static boolean isGnuplotPresent()
        Checks if Gnuplot is present in the system
        Returns:
        true if Gnuplot is present, false otherwise

      • getTerminalName

        public static String getTerminalName(Plot.ImageType t)
        Gets a GnuPlot terminal name from an image type
        Parameters:
        t - The image type
        Returns:
        The terminal name

      • getHeader

        public StringBuilder getHeader(Plot.ImageType term,
                               String lab_name,
                               boolean with_caption)
        Produces a header that is common to all plots generated by the application
        Parameters:
        term - The terminal to display this plot
        lab_name - The name of the lab
        with_caption - Set to true to ignore the plot's caption when rendering
        Returns:
        The header

      • getFillColor

        protected final String getFillColor(int color_nb)
        Gets the fill color associated with a number, based on the palette defined for this plot.
        Parameters:
        color_nb - The color number
        Returns:
        An empty string if no palette is defined, otherwise the fillcolor expression corresponding to the color
